characters.name: Unicorn
characters.description: A mystical unicorn with a shimmering white coat and a long, spiraling, golden horn. It has a flowing, rainbow-colored mane and tail, with bright, sparkling eyes.

scenes.background_description: A serene meadow illuminated by the gentle glow of the early afternoon sun, surrounded by rolling hills and dotted with vibrant wildflowers swaying in a light breeze. The atmosphere is peaceful, with an air of enchantment as a single unicorn gracefully makes its way across the picturesque landscape. The scene is painted in a classic storybook illustration style with soft, whimsical colors reminiscent of timeless children's tales.
scenes.narration_text: The unicorn walks gracefully through the enchanting meadow, each step a gentle dance upon the soft earth.

scenes.background_description: An idyllic forest path dappled with the fading light of late afternoon, lined with towering ancient trees whose leaves whisper in the calm breeze. The ambiance is mystical, as the unicorn continues its tranquil journey, casting a long shadow on the forest floor. Captured in the style of a classic storybook illustration, the scene features rich, earthy colors and soft, flowing lines.
scenes.narration_text: Continuing its journey, the unicorn walks along the serene forest path, its presence a quiet testament to the magic of the woods.
